import styles from '../horario/HorarioCard.module.css' import { BsFillTrashFill } from 'react-icons/bs' function ServiceCard({ id, name, cost, description, handleRemove }) { const remove = (e) => { e.preventDefault() handleRemove(id, cost) } return (

{name}

Custo total: R${cost}

{description}

) } export default ServiceCard
